popup.title: Bars
popup.shortdesc: Persistent header and footer bars that scroll with your visitors.

popup.title: Modals
popup.shortdesc: Popups that appear to capture visitor's attention at key moments.

popup.title: Alerts
popup.shortdesc: Small floating messages to provide user prompts and engagement.

popup.title: Sliders
popup.shortdesc: Engaging sliders that rotate through relevant content.

popup.title: Page Takeovers
popup.shortdesc: Full screen takeovers for when you want to get your visitor's full attention.

customization.text: 100s of pre-built themes. Find one that fits your brand style.
Customize any element with the visual editor. Color, size, layout, and more.
Automatically detects your site design and matches colors, fonts, and styling.

targetting.text: Target visitors by city, state, country, and more.
Target visitors by ad, campaign, source, medium, and more.
Schedule messaging and offers by time, date, returning visitors, and more.

tracking.text: Metrics let you track and analyze performance. See what's working and what you need to improve.
Create custom reports with the data most relevant to your business.
Run A/B tests to find new and better-performing campaigns.
